response:
Multifocal, asymmetric peripheral nerve involvement evolving over days in a young adult suggests an inflammatory or vasculitic mononeuritis multiplex as the leading diagnosis; hereditary predisposition to pressure palsies and coincidental compressive neuropathies are important alternatives, with immune-mediated demyelinating neuropathies and metabolic or infective causes also considered.

differential_diagnosis = ["Mononeuritis multiplex secondary to systemic vasculitis", "Hereditary neuropathy with liability to pressure palsies (HNPP)", "Multiple compressive mononeuropathies (right ulnar neuropathy and left common peroneal neuropathy)", "Multifocal acquired demyelinating sensory and motor neuropathy (MADSAM)", "Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyradiculoneuropathy (CIDP)", "Diabetes-related mononeuropathies", "HIV-associated mononeuritis multiplex"]
